title: The Tales of Rien Village #1: "Toilet ni Ittokiya"
original_name: rien 村物語 #1 「トイレにいっときやー」
sinopse: A gentle children’s story concerning the ceramic inhabitants of Rein Village. Fortune Malon has many visitors who come for advice which may or not be helpful. One night an elephant calf comes and visits Fortune Malon with a rather embarrassing predicament.
